news.title: Wall Street wrote off Palantir as too expensive. Retail investors can't get enough
news.description: The stock, which made its market debut in 2020, is an indisputable star of the retail investing world.

news.title: Why buying Berkshire was Warren Buffett's biggest mistake
news.description: As Warren Buffett goes into his last week as Berkshire Hathaway's CEO, a 2010 CNBC video clip has him explaining why buying the company was his biggest mistake.

news.title: Exclusive: Nvidia buying AI chip startup Groq's assets for about $20 billion in its largest deal on record
news.description: Nvidia is making its largest purchase ever, acquiring assets from nine-year-old chip startup Groq for about $20 billion.

news.title: Tariffs hit boots, bags and more as leather prices jump — and relief could be years away
news.description: Leather prices are expected to continue rising in 2026 as Trump's tariffs crimple a global supply-chain while domestic manufacturing and cattle herds are down.

news.title: Monetizers vs manufactures: How the AI market could splinter in 2026
news.description: AI infrastructure firms are set to win from the evolution of once asset-light Big Tech firms.

news.title: This discount retailer thrived in 2025 despite a volatile backdrop. Why that momentum can continue in 2026
news.description: The company hit an all-time high earlier in December, and the stock is up more than 19% — outpacing the S&P 500's 17% advance.

news.title: ‘No doubt’ U.S. economy is slowing, Invesco says, tipping Europe to outperform
news.description: Invesco's Ben Gutteridge sees a mid-cycle slowdown in the U.S., with Europe poised to outperform in 2026.

news.title: DOJ says more than 1 million potential Epstein files newly uncovered
news.description: A bipartisan group of Senators on Wednesday said the Trump administration violated the law by failing to release the records in full last week.

news.title: A rotation into value stocks from growth could grow stronger in the new year
news.description: Value stocks have enjoyed a late-year resurgence, after underperforming earlier in 2025.

news.title: These 5 infrastructure stocks have more than tripled this year on the AI trade
news.description: While Nvidia has been the biggest infrastructure winner during the AI boom, other data center stocks have performed better this year.

news.title: Amazon faces 'leader's dilemma' — fight AI shopping bots or join them
news.description: Agents like OpenAI's Instant Checkout and Perplexity's Instant Buy threaten to reshape the e-commerce landscape.

news.title: Waymo will update driverless fleet after San Francisco blackout to improve navigation during outages
news.description: Three days after blackouts in San Francisco brought down Waymo's service, the company said it's implementing changes for when "infrastructure fails."

news.title: Gas prices fall to four-year lows as millions embark on holiday road trips
news.description: The average price of unleaded gasoline in the U.S. is at its lowest since 2021, according to AAA.

news.title: Trust these numbers? Economists see a lot of flaws in delayed CPI report showing downward inflation
news.description: Thursday saw the release of a much lighter-than-expected inflation report for November, and economists are already questioning its significance.

news.title: November consumer prices rose at a 2.7% annual rate, lower than expected, delayed data shows
news.description: Economists polled by Dow Jones expected CPI to have risen 3.1% on an annualized basis.

news.title: Bank of England cuts interest rates, in welcome Christmas boost for consumers
news.description: The Bank of England voted to cut interest rates from 4% to 3.75% in its last monetary policy move of 2025.

news.title: November's inflation report is the first to be released after the shutdown. Here's what to expect
news.description: November's CPI report is expected to show the annual inflation rate at 3.1%, according to economists polled by Dow Jones.

news.title: Watch Fed Governor Christopher Waller speak on interest rates and the race to succeed Powell
news.description: Waller is one of the five finalists considered for to replace Fed Chairman Jerome Powell when his term expires in May.

news.title: Here's what would it take for an Amazon stock comeback in 2026
news.description: After a year defined by worries about cloud growth and tariff impact on retail, Amazon stock heads into the new year poised for gains.

news.title: The blowout AI trades that surprised Wall Street in 2025
news.description: We lay out the AI trades that captured the market's attention, from Google's unexpected growth to the boom in rocket companies and self-driving cars.

news.title: Libyan army's chief dies in plane crash in Turkey
news.description: The Libyan army's chief of staff, Mohammed Ali Ahmed Al-Haddad, died in a plane crash on Tuesday after leaving Turkey's capital Ankara, the prime minister of Libya's internationally recognised government said, adding that four others were on the jet as well.

news.title: Supreme Court rejects Trump's bid to send National Guard to Chicago
news.description: In an unsigned decision released on Tuesday, the court said Trump lacked the authority to federalize troops in Chicago.

news.title: Epstein files: Latest batch from DOJ includes a personal letter, emails and heavily redacted documents
news.description: The release comes amid intense scrutiny from congressional lawmakers and victims over the DOJ's handling of the Epstein files.

news.title: Greenland PM rebukes Trump special envoy overture
news.description: President Donald Trump on Sunday appointed Louisiana Gov. Jeff Landry as a "special envoy" to Greenland.

news.title: Crypto laments loss of key ally on Capitol Hill after Lummis announces retirement
news.description: Sen. Cynthia Lummis’ retirement tees up a Republican primary in Wyoming, where the victor will be heavily favored in November.
